law.catch_line: Promotion of sales in Kentucky of property located outside state.
law.text: Any licensee who engages in promotional activities in this Commonwealth for property located outside of this Commonwealth shall first apply to the commission for its approval before so doing, and shall comply with administrative regulations, restrictions, and conditions the commission may impose as well as those provisions set forth in this chapter.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 488, sec. 14, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 448, sec. 15, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 352, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1984.
